content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, Gang Busters brings us their story from April 24, 1948, The Case Of The Quincy Killers.

(24:16) Our second story is The Big Tooth, from Dragnet. That episode originally aired February 15, 1953.

Download CaseClosed740

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
